Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class AttributeExpression

    Implements the construct for evaluating Expressions tied to attributes on landscape objects. Whenever an AttributeExpression is evaluated, the attribute specified by AttributeName on object with ID ResidingObjectId on the residing landscape is updated.

    Inheritance
    System.Object

    Name of the attribute the AttributeExpression is setting.

    AttributeType

    Type of the attribute the AttributeExpression is setting. Currently supported types are 'string', 'bool', 'int' and 'double'.

    ID of the object in the landscape. When the Expression is evaluated the object will be updated.
